name: Dive Zombie
description:
it`s a FPS Game. Attack the zombie!
Challenge HiScore.

Best used with Durovis Dive, Enjoy 3D Game with the Dive Device.
But Can Enjoy "Normal Play" without the Dive Device.

Enjoy! VR Game!

◆ Example Dive Devices
Google Cardboard, Homido, Stooksy, Hacosco, Gear, GearVR ..etc
